title: President of Haiti speaking at Spring Valley church Wednesday
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest President of Haiti speaking at Spring Valley church Wednesday Haitian President Michel Martelly is scheduled to speak at St. Joseph Church in Spring Valley on Wednesday night, with local artists performing. Post to Facebook President of Haiti speaking at Spring Valley church Wednesday Haitian President Michel Martelly is scheduled to speak at St. Joseph Church in Spring Valley on Wednesday night, with local artists performing. Check out this story on lohud.com: http://lohud.us/1FB2qgA Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs President of Haiti speaking at Spring Valley church Wednesday Steve Lieberman , slieberm@lohud.com 7:02 p.m. EDT September 29, 2015 President Michel Martelly will make his first visit to Haitian-rich village since taking office in May 2011 News-In-Brief 38 CONNECT 17 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
SPRING VALLEY Haitian President Michel Martelly is scheduled to visit the village on Wednesday night. 
Martelly will speak to residents at St. Joseph Church, 245 N. Main St., starting at 7:30 p.m. The village boasts large Haitian and Caribbean communities, along with a large African-American population and growing Hispanic and Hasidic Jewish populations. 
Martelly, 54, a businessman and former musician who performed as Sweet Micky, has been president since May 14, 2011. He's visiting the United States for United Nations week in Manhattan. 
This will be his first visit to Spring Valley, according to the Rockland County Presidential Committee. 
Spring Valley Mayor Demeza Delhomme and other local dignitaries are expected to attend and local artists will perform. 
No one will be admitted without a ticket, and no tickets will be available at the door. A limited number of tickets are available at the following locations: La Bagette D'Or, 216 N. Main Street, Spring Valley. Speedy Import & Export, 156 N. Main Street, Spring Valley. Konbit Neg Lakay, 16 W.Church Street, Spring Valley.
